item.title: CVE-2018-1117|2024-08-05T03:51:48.428Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- ovirt-ansible-roles
item.description: ovirt-ansible-roles before version 1.0.6 has a vulnerability due to a missing no_log directive, resulting in the 'Add oVirt Provider to ManageIQ/CloudForms' playbook inadvertently disclosing admin passwords in the provisioning log. In an environment where logs are shared with other parties, this could lead to privilege escalation.
